Name: Biscuit
Review Text: My coffee - brunch - break place. The girls are great, very friendly. I reccommend the thai chicken soup and the avocado cake ;-)

Review Text: The expresso is not to be remembered, pleasant lady behind the counter though. Slightly cute shop.

Name: Biscuit
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Pearl in Old South. Really formidable sandwiches. True buffalo mozzarella, richly invested, good compositions. The drinks are fine but over priced. And the service is blunt in my experience, but not blunt than usual …
